text: A mega job fair, under the auspices of Pudu Vaazhvu Thittam, will be conducted at Edward Higher Secondary School, Sattur, on February 6 for the benefit of those in the age group of 19 to 35 years. Over 100 recruiting companies from textiles, automobiles and information technology sectors are expected to participate in the fair, according to a press release from V. Rajaraman, Collector. Candidates will also be chosen to training in cookery, automobile maintenance and in fire safety services under the thittam at the fair.
title: Mega job fair
